text:
A man has been arrested for allegedly raping his 18-year-old daughter for four years here, police said on Sunday.

A complaint was registered on Friday by the victim after she recorded a video clip as her mother refused to believe that she was being raped by her father.

“My father was sexually abusing me for the last four years. I informed my mother, but she did not believe me. Then I made a video clip to prove it,” the victim said.

The girl was pursuing a course in nursing and stayed with her sister and father in a rented house, police said. Following the complaint, the father was arrested. — PTI
title: U.P. man held for raping daughter
